The end to end process

- Get the website working locally (HTML, CSS, JS, DJANGO).

- AWS EC2 - Set up a server for hosting our website. Use git and Linux to upload our website.

- Use Linux to configure our Django setings for browser Access. Configure AWS security. Website live!

- Use Gunicorn and Nginx to keep the website running by itself.

- Use google domains * to purchase a URL and make our website live with a URL.

*Similar services available
